pages.css: <style>.Banner-box { position: fixed; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: 10; width: 100%; padding: 24px; background: #fff; box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 0px rgb(204 204 204/80%); max-height: 100%; overflow: auto; border-radius: 6px; box-sizing: border-box; overflow-wrap: anywhere; } .Banner-content { margin-bottom: 16px; display: flex; flex-direction: row; } .Banner-content-summary { margin-right: 36px; width: 330px; overflow: auto; } .Banner-content-description { font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; } .Banner-categories { display: flex; overflow-x: auto; width: 100%; } .Banner-content-header { margin-bottom: 16px; font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 600; font-size: 24px; line-height: 24px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .Banner-save-button { box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; width: fit-content; padding: 2px 20px; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #0078d4; color: #fff; text-decoration: none; text-align: center; font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-size: 13px; line-height: 21px; cursor: pointer; border: none; margin-right: 10px; } .Banner-model-buttonactions { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .Banner-content { flex-direction: column; } .Banner-content-summary { margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; } .Banner-categories { flex-direction: column; display: flex; overflow-x: visible; } .Banner-box { overflow-y: auto; width: calc(100% - 16px); padding: 8px; } .Banner-content-description { width: auto; } .Banner-save-button { margin-right: 0; } }</style>
